description.value: Creating as a subflow that gets triggered from scheduled job. Job runs daily to get all projects due dates and compare to the as of date. If match, trigger flow.
description.display_value: Creating as a subflow that gets triggered from scheduled job. Job runs daily to get all projects due dates and compare to the as of date. If match, trigger flow.
